channel.title: the guardrex chew
channel.description: Read guardrex articles on IT topics.

item.title: ASP.NET Core on Nano Server Preview
item.description: Deploy an ASP.NET Core web application to a Microsoft Azure Nano Server virtual machine and learn how to safely manage Nano Server using a WS 2012 R2 VM.

item.title: Razor Compile-time Minification for ASP.NET Core 2.0
item.description: Learn how to use the extensibility features of the Razor engine in ASP.NET Core 2.0 to minify Razor Pages and MVC Razor Views at compile time.
